extendedInfo.description: ****Snowy Evening With Fire Live Wallpaper in my phone is sure to impress.****This elegant image of the full moon reflecting in the winter forest on a dark winter night in live motion as a wallpaper on your phone is simply breathtaking.We would like to credit the design to Kim Norlien for his masterful portrait of this breathtaking live image for all to see!You have never seen a Snowy Evening With Fire wallpaper quite like this.This is simply the best live Snowy Evening With Fire crackling on your phone as a live motion wallpaper you will ever take advantage of. Best of all its FREE!!Snowy Evening With Fire as a live image is a tranquil image good for escaping the everyday norm and as a meditation tool as well.Enjoy the peace and quite image as you go about your day.Watch the Snowy Evening With Fire as a live image on your smart phone. Save as a wallpaper and or background. You control the user settings in this very user console.Control the speed and the resolution of the snowy evening moving freely in the forest under the dark night with a full moon as per your personal specifications.This Snowy Evening With Fire is like nothing you have ever seen!I do not need to say anything more. The image of the Snowy Evening With Fire does all of the talking.This is ad supported so we can pay our billsWe want to keep the app completely free, In order to keep free is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and or home screen. This will help keep it free and help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future.You can optout notification ads from:Airpush Optout: http://www.airpush.com/optoutSendDroid Optout: http://senddroid.com/opt-out/every mobile landing page that the user is directed to has an "unsubscribe" link at the bottom, which opts-out a user with a single click.

reviews.title: It makes me feel good
reviews.comment: something about this app that makes me feel good--i want more
reviews.author: James Erick
